headline: How Investors May Respond To EOG Resources (EOG) Downgrades And Texas Well Productivity Concerns
summary: In January, several analysts reassessed EOG Resources after KeyBanc downgraded the stock, pointing to weakening well productivity in core Texas plays like the Eagle Ford and Delaware Basin, while others adjusted their outlooks in light of softer oil price assumptions. An interesting angle is that, despite concerns about legacy Texas assets and a pressured oil market, analysts still emphasize EOG’s capital discipline and exposure to potentially resilient natural gas demand as important...
